articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
The Christmas season brought a deep chill to Southern Oregon’s renewable energy sector this week as Purelight Power, the Medford-based residential solar giant, announced the immediate cessation of all operations. The company, which had grown into one of the largest installers in the region, is moving toward a total liquidation under Chapter 7 bankruptcy, citing…
The post The Sun Sets on Purelight Power: Medford Headquarters Shutter as Federal Solar Credits Vanish appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: The Sun Sets on Purelight Power: Medford Headquarters Shutter as Federal Solar Credits Vanish
